name: Igor: Objective Uikokahonia
storyline: Igor is a student at a typical university in the USA who is madly in love with fellow student Laura, although she does not know it. While spying on her he overhears her plans to travel to a paradise island named Uikokahonia. Igor's worst enemy Phillip, who is also after Laura, is also traveling there. Igor wants to join too to be closer to Laura and keep an eye on Phillip. But before he can embark on the trip he must take a biology exam, submit an end of semester essay and find the money for the ticket.
summary:
Igor, a college student, wants to date the most beautiful girl of his school. Instead he discovers a criminal plot he has to investigate.

The game offers classic 2D point-and-click adventure gameplay. There are actions buttons near the bottom of the screen, as well as an inventory.
